scripts.build: node scripts/fetch-static-data.js && node scripts/prerender-content.js && vite build && node scripts/inline-critical-css.js && node scripts/generate-static-pages.js && node scripts/generate-sitemap.js
scripts.build:full: node scripts/fetch-static-data.js && node scripts/generate-og-images.js && node scripts/generate-apple-icons.js && node scripts/prerender-content.js && vite build && node scripts/inline-critical-css.js && node scripts/generate-static-pages.js && node scripts/generate-sitemap.js
scripts.generate-icons: node scripts/generate-apple-icons.js && node scripts/generate-all-icons.js && node scripts/generate-og-images.js
